entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
